summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of, all in accordance with Resolution No. Main Street (in what is commonly known as Hillman City) from Rainier Boulevard to Bateman Street, by grading and curbing the same to a width of 24 feet, in accordance with Majority Petition No. 32845 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
